item.title: Direnv Dir Env Variable
item.description: DIRENV_DIR environment variable Question For some reason DIRENV_DIR has appended - before $PWD $ echo $DIRENV_DIR -$PWD Answer https://github.com/direnv/direnv/commit/b18b1f59a9eed1b3d7cb2f06980da3f94dad0155#diff-221dbe7605813b08a9a1f12ea8a612f2006f9376d0699dcf6538dca1aa30c668 https://github.com/direnv/direnv/commit/d7778d14384a7c459351cc212b56dacd8b7f0470 What I Learned We need to strip “-” from DIRENV_DIR before using it $ echo ${DIRENV_DIR#-} $PWD There is “named directories” concept in zsh but I still need to properly understand it.
